subject: Continuous Integration for JUnit
msgSnippet: I have been using JUnit for over five year. It has become a key element of our software development process. I believe our Parabuild wouldn t be possible
messageBody:
I have been using JUnit for over five year. It has become a key
element of our software development process. I believe our Parabuild
wouldn't be possible without JUnit.

So I thought that it would be natural to give back by setting up
continuous integration for JUnit using a product that owes its quality
to this great testing framework. Here is the URL:

http://parabuild.viewtier.com:8080/parabuild/index.htm?displaygroupid=2
<http://parabuild.viewtier.com:8080/parabuild/index.htm?displaygroupid=2\
>

Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Regards,

Slava Imeshev
vimeshev@...
